title: Script Font in Logo
content:
Hey Everyone,

Trying to match this typeface. Looks very similar to Edwardian, but the "r" is different along with some other subtle differences. Anyone know what it is?

Thanks!

Font: 

 Balmoral 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317152851/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

author: r44mercer

comments.content: **[Balmoral](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317152851/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Balmoral%20LET%20-%20Plain&fid=01ec615b2a802e336702f44fb6d27f8c&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Grown&fit=1)** by Martin Wait [Letraset, 1978] also available from Linotype, URW++, ITC...
